channel.title: Help with setting up CashU
channel.description:
[url=https://www.cashu.com/site/en/consumers]CashU[/url] was mentioned by a friend on mine so I though I would use it for the sake of having another payment method available.
I was wondering if anybody know how actually use this because I don't. I want whatever is in the users shopping cart to update with this.
[size=8pt][php]<form action="https://sandbox.cashu.com/cgi-bin/pcashu.cgi" method="post"> <input type="hidden" name="merchant_id" value="my-swagger"> //required <input type="hidden" name="token" value="c0859b781cffb4b5472ab44c0b86eeb1"> //required <input type="hidden" name="display_text" value="Xite"> <input type="hidden" name="currency" value="GBP"> <input type="hidden" name="amount" value="1.0"> //required <input type="hidden" name="language" value="en"> <input type="hidden" name="session_id" value=""> <input type="hidden" name="txt1" value="No text needed here"> <input type="hidden" name="servicesName" value="Xite"> //required </form>[/php][/size]
That's what the code looks like for a normal buy now button. The token is generated from CashU's website (the code is generated on their website, a bit like PayPal). The service name was already created on their website.
When I change the price I get error. (value) The token is what is verifying? the checkout option?
Any ideas?

item.title: Help with setting up CashU

item.description:
@ixia wrote:

CashU was mentioned by a friend on mine so I though I would use it for the sake of having another payment method available.

I was wondering if anybody know how actually use this because I don’t. I want whatever is in the users shopping cart to update with this.

[/php][/size]

That’s what the code looks like for a normal buy now button. The token is generated from CashU’s website (the code is generated on their website, a bit like PayPal). The service name was already created on their website.

When I change the price I get error. (value)
The token is what is verifying? the checkout option?
